name: Chaos Gear
description:
// The World

Set in a steampunk fantasy world filled with ancient robotic monster enhanced by magical powers, where the adventurers all over the world has reverse engineered the ancient tech and created their own robotic companions to travel along and aid in their adventures.

// Survive in a Dark Dungeon

Play as Servant #366, an assistant robot assigned to a certain group of adventurers, who was treated like mere object, slave, even used as a shield until the adventurers deem him a deadweight and left him to rust.

Betrayed by his own comrades, Servant #366 is set out to take his well deserved revenge, but first, he must escape the dungeon.

// Zero to Hero

With nothing left but a severed head, you must sneak, fight, collect and upgrade your way through the dungeon.
